thread.title: Video: Lakers' Julius Randle blocks little kid's shot in 1-on-1 game
thread.title_full: Video: Lakers' Julius Randle blocks little kid's shot in 1-on-1 game

title: Video: Lakers' Julius Randle blocks little kid's shot in 1-on-1 game
text:
7:44p ET 
NBA players demoralizing little kids in 1-on-1 games seems to be the trend this offseason . 
Lakers second-year big man Julius Randle took part in the ruthless activity recently, blocking a child's shot at the Boys & Girls Club of Hawaii. 
Check out the gruesome footage below: true A video posted by Charles C. Spalding Clubhouse (@spaldingbgch) on Oct 5, 2015 at 9:27pm PDT 
Poor kid. Important life lesson: NBA players are very, very good at basketball. You can't break that weak stuff in there. Make sure to use your left hand next time, too.
